description: OrthoFinder 2.0 using DIAMOND and with default options. Command: "orthofinder -S diamond_more_sensitive -f 2011_04_reference_proteomes/" (defaults: DendroBLAST trees, species tree rooted by STRIDE, new OrthoFinder 2 orthologue inference method from gene trees)
name: OrthoFinder-2.0-DIAMOND
